display_name: Filtered: Overall Non-Supine RDI at 3% desat
description: Non-Supine RDI at 3% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-supine body position associated with >= 3% desat) / (hours of sleep)]. Will be missing if no time non-supine or low position sensor quality.
calculations: 60*(hrop3 +   hnrop3 + carop3 + canop3 + oarop3 + oanop3 + marop3 + manrop3)/(remepop+nremepop)
